/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street is teeming with life, with cars and buses moving along it, their colors muted against the bright blue sky. The sun shines brightly in the top right corner of the image, casting a warm glow over the scene. On either side of the street, trees stand tall, their leaves a vibrant green. Buildings rise in the background, their details obscured by the distance. The image is bathed in the soft light of day, highlighting the hustle and bustle of city life in Beijing.
